pullrequest.title: updated arat.world to reflect specifications of the ARAT test

content.raw:
Pull request dependencies are difficult to handle. It will be easier on you and reviewers if you submit & merge individual pull requests in the appropriate order instead of submitting everything at once. No need to change this pull request.

I think your link to pull request #98 is incorrect. It should point to the `gazebo_models` repo.
content.html:
Pull request dependencies are difficult to handle. It will be easier on you and reviewers if you submit & merge individual pull requests in the appropriate order instead of submitting everything at once. No need to change this pull request.
